text: Brian E. Dubie (born 9 March 1959) is an American politician. He was the 80th Lieutenant Governor of Vermont from 2003 to 2011. He lost the 2010 election for Governor of Vermont by fewer than 5,000 votes.Associated Press , Lawmakers Set to Formally Elect Shumlin, Barre-Montpelier Times Argus, January 6, 2011David Gram, Associated Press, Vt. Lawmakers Elect New Governor Before Inaugural, Boston Globe, January 6, 2011Vermont General Assembly, Journal of the Joint Assembly, January 6, 2011, page 5 ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Lieutenant Governors of Vermont Category:Living people Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:American aviators Category:People from Burlington, Vermont
title: Brian Dubie
